function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Claimed risk of short-and medium-range person-to-person distance in aerosol transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Maintaining proper ventilation and air filtration systems, implementing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation technology","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building owners, health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Relative contributions of different influenza virus exposure pathways","Impact":"Varying levels of risk from different exposure pathways","Mitigation":"Promoting hand hygiene, using masks, implementing proper respiratory etiquette","Technologies":"Hand sanitizer dispensers, mask-wearing protocols","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities, employers"},{"Description":"Potential risk of indoor airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor airborne transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation, filtration, and air sterilization systems","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, air sterilization technology","People":"Building occupants, general public","Owner":"Building owners, health authorities, government"}]}
